alert.note: Alert for Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 30 at 10:39AM PST until January 31 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTERY WEATHER FOR THE INLAND NORTHWEST INTO MONDAY... .Heavier Snow in the mountains and valleys is expected to increase later Sunday with snow persisting into Monday for the mountains. Mixed wintry weather with rain, snow and a little sleet or freezing rain can be expected in the south parts of eastern Washington and Idaho Panhandle. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 8 and 14 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Holden Village, Stehekin, and Stevens Pass. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Expect winter travel across Stevens Pass on Highway 2. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches Sunday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
